sub_workout_group.name: Beginner Core Strength Routine
sub_workout_group.description: Basic core exercises to build foundational abdominal and lower back strength.

sub_workouts.name: Plank Hold
sub_workouts.description: Maintain a forearm plank while engaging your core muscles.

sub_workouts.name: Dead Bug
sub_workouts.description: Lie on your back and extend opposite arm and leg while keeping your core engaged.

sub_workouts.name: Seated Russian Twists
sub_workouts.description: Rotate your torso side to side while seated, engaging the obliques.

sub_workouts.name: Bird Dog
sub_workouts.description: Extend one arm and the opposite leg while keeping your core stable.

sub_workouts.name: Leg Raises
sub_workouts.description: Lift your legs up and down while lying on your back, avoiding lower back strain.

sub_workouts.name: Glute Bridge Hold
sub_workouts.description: Hold a glute bridge position while keeping your core tight.

sub_workout_group.name: Intermediate Core Strength Routine
sub_workout_group.description: Moderate core exercises to enhance abdominal and lower back strength.

sub_workouts.name: Plank with Shoulder Taps
sub_workouts.description: In a plank position, tap each shoulder with the opposite hand while maintaining stability.

sub_workouts.name: Side Plank
sub_workouts.description: Hold a side plank position while engaging your obliques.

sub_workouts.name: Bicycle Crunches
sub_workouts.description: Perform bicycle crunches while keeping your lower back pressed into the floor.

sub_workouts.name: Plank Up-Downs
sub_workouts.description: Transition between forearm and high plank positions while engaging your core.

sub_workouts.name: Reverse Crunches
sub_workouts.description: Lift your hips off the floor while keeping your knees bent and core engaged.

sub_workout_group.name: Advanced Core Power Routine
sub_workout_group.description: More intense core exercises to build strength, endurance, and power.

sub_workouts.name: Hanging Leg Raises
sub_workouts.description: Hang from a bar and lift your legs to a 90-degree angle while keeping control.

sub_workouts.name: Cable Woodchoppers
sub_workouts.description: Use a cable machine to rotate from high to low, engaging the obliques.

sub_workouts.name: Weighted Decline Sit-Ups
sub_workouts.description: Perform sit-ups on a decline bench while holding a weight plate.

sub_workouts.name: L-Sit Hold
sub_workouts.description: Hold an L-position with straight legs using parallettes or bars.

sub_workouts.name: Ab Rollouts
sub_workouts.description: Use an ab wheel to roll out while keeping your core engaged.

sub_workouts.name: Hollow Body Hold
sub_workouts.description: Hold a hollow body position, keeping your lower back on the floor.

sub_workout_group.name: Super Core Strength Routine
sub_workout_group.description: Extreme core exercises designed for elite athletes and advanced lifters.

sub_workouts.name: Dragon Flags
sub_workouts.description: Hold onto a bench and raise your body up, keeping it rigid as you lower down.

sub_workouts.name: One-Arm Hanging Leg Raises
sub_workouts.description: Perform leg raises while hanging with one arm, requiring extreme control.

sub_workouts.name: Weighted Front Lever Hold
sub_workouts.description: Hold your body in a straight line while hanging from a bar.

sub_workouts.name: Standing Ab Rollouts
sub_workouts.description: Perform an ab rollout from a standing position using full core engagement.

sub_workouts.name: Full Planche Hold
sub_workouts.description: Hold a full planche with your body parallel to the ground, requiring intense core and arm strength.

sub_workouts.name: Windshield Wipers
sub_workouts.description: While hanging from a bar, rotate your legs from side to side like a windshield wiper.
